0.question: How much luggage can I carry without having to pay extra?

answer.0: You are exclusively entitled to 2 medium-sized suitcases with a maximum total weight of 80 pounds per adult ticket, while for children or minors, it is 1 medium-sized suitcase of maximum 40 pounds.
answer.1: If you exceed the permitted weight in your luggage, an excess weight fee will be applied and will be allowed depending on space availability.
answer.2: The passenger must inform if they wish to carry additional luggage on their trip, by contacting the main offices.

1.question: What is considered excess baggage or oversized baggage?

answer.0: Excess or oversized luggage is considered to be any type of luggage that is not a standard suitcase.
answer.1: Excess baggage is subject to space availability and its acceptance is not always guaranteed.
answer.2: Examples of oversized luggage or excess luggage: televisions, boxes, coolers, strollers, among others.

2.question: What is the maximum weight of my hand luggage?

answer.0: Your ticket is entitled to one briefcase, backpack or personal bag not exceeding 10 pounds in the luggage rack that belongs to your assigned seat.

3.question: Can I travel with my pet?

answer.0: No, the company does not currently accept pet service on trips and it is not allowed.

4.question: What items are not allowed to be carried?

answer.0: The following items are not permitted on our travel routes:
answer.3: Flammable materials or liquids such as gasoline
answer.4: Pointed or sharp objects that may represent a risk to the safety of passengers
answer.6: Prohibited and illegal substances or non-prescription medications

0.question: From what age do children pay their fare?

answer.0: Children from age 3 to 11 have access to a reduced fare. From age 12 and older, children must pay their adult ticket and travel in their own seat.
answer.1: In the case of infants or infants under 3 years of age, they may travel free of charge, but do not have an assigned seat.

1.question: Do you have a special rate for Senior Adults?

answer.0: Yes, we have a reduced fare for passengers over 60 years of age, presenting an identification document at the time of purchasing your ticket.

2.question: Do you have a special rate for University Students?

answer.0: Currently, we do not have a special rate. However, we invite you to consult our offers and promotions in our office at any time.

3.question: If I can't travel, can I reschedule my trip or get a refund?

answer.0: Yes, you can reschedule your trip, at no extra cost, as long as it is done up to 2 days before the scheduled trip date indicated on the ticket.
answer.1: If you wish to make other changes or postponements, you have up to 1 day before the travel date indicated on the ticket, with a penalty of 20% of the original cost. If you make a change, it will be valid to use only 80% of the original value of the ticket in your favor for the acquisition of a new one at the current rate.
answer.2: In case the ticket is not used on the established date, the ticket will be canceled and invalid.
answer.3: We do not grant refunds or money back, only postponements or rescheduling according to the previous conditions.

4.question: Is the ticket transferable? Is there any additional cost?

answer.0: Remember that the travel ticket is personal, non-transferable and the only proof to travel.
You may request a duplicate, assuming the responsibility of paying the corresponding administrative expense of the new printed ticket.

0.question: What time should I be at the terminal?

answer.0: We recommend that you be present at the terminal at least 15 minutes before the departure time indicated on your ticket to check-in your bags.
answer.1: During boarding, make sure you have both your travel ticket and your identification document on hand.

1.question: Should I print my ticket before boarding?

answer.0: Yes, if you have purchased your tickets in person, we will deliver the printed tickets to our offices.
answer.1: If you have made a reservation or purchase through our website, you can present your tickets digitally, or you can also go to the counter or our offices to request your printed ticket.

2.question: Can I buy more than one ticket in my purchasing process?

answer.0: Yes, during your purchase process on the web platform you can select the number of seats you wish to purchase.
answer.1: Remember that for each seat chosen you will be asked for the information of the passenger who will board the vehicle.

answer.0: We serve you in our offices from Monday to Sunday from 7:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.

sensibles.text: “Smile Bus” will not collect or process sensitive personal data of any kind.

text.0: Your personal data will be used for the following purposes:
text.1: Primary Purposes: Purposes that gave rise to and are necessary for the existence, maintenance and fulfillment of the legal relationship between you and “Smile Bus”:
text.2: Identification and contact.
text.3: Contracting, follow-up, updating, confirmation and generation of history of the products and/or services contracted.
text.4: Creating, updating, customizing, maintaining and authenticating your user account
text.5: Attention to doubts, complaints, comments, suggestions, clarifications and follow-up.
text.6: For the security of persons, when acquiring a product or service, you may be videotaped or photographed, for which reason you are informed that the images from the video recordings or photographs will be protected by “THE LAW” and “THE REGULATIONS”, and will be kept in the databases for a period of ten calendar days, after which time the video recordings or photographs will be formatted or eliminated.
text.7: Credit and payment validation and fraud risk assessment of transactions.
text.8: Invoicing of contracted services or products.
text.9: Compliance with legal and regulatory obligations, as well as requirements of governmental or judicial authorities, Federal, State or Municipal and/or regulatory entities.
text.10: Secondary Purposes: Different purposes that do not give rise to the legal relationship between you and “Smile Bus”, but that are extremely useful for us to provide you with a better service and develop new products and services:
text.11: Evaluation of service quality through surveys, studies on consumer habits and preferences.
text.12: Participation in contests, sweepstakes, events and promotions. We inform you that, in the event that you participate in such activities, “Smile Bus” may collect your image through videos and/or photographs and publish them through different media both physical and electronic, as well as your personal data, such as full name and surname, date of birth, email, address and telephone number, in order to document your participation or deliver the corresponding prize or incentive.
text.13: Inform you and/or offer you the range of products and services marketed by “Smile Bus” and communicate promotions.
text.15: Perform massive data analysis techniques to carry out profiling activities and improve customer knowledge.
text.16: The provision of the services and/or the creation of an account implies the full and unreserved consent of the users to the processing of their Personal Data in accordance with this Privacy Notice.
text.17: In the event that you wish to OPPOSE that your personal data be processed for the secondary purposes described above, you must send an email to datos.personales@smilebus.com.mx or submit a written request in Spanish to the following address: Corredor Industrial Exterior Number 3, Number Interior Building Corp. 21 Colonia Frac Industrial Sahagún, Municipality Tepeapulco, Postal Code 43998, Hidalgo, Mexico, stating the purpose or secondary purposes to which you object.

limitaciones.title: Limitations on the use of data

text.0: You may limit the use or disclosure of your personal data by sending us a written request in Spanish language, addressed to the PERSONAL DATA PROTECTION OFFICE OF “Smile Bus”, to the e-mail datos.personales@smilebus.com.mx or to the following address: Corredor Industrial Número Exterior 3, Numero Interior Edif. Corp. 21 Colonia Frac Industrial Sahagún, Municipality Tepeapulco, Postal Code 43998, Hidalgo, Mexico, where you mention your intention to limit the use or disclosure of your personal data and indicate necessary information such as: full name and surname, simple copy of your official identification, customer number (in case you have one), telephone number and address or e-mail.
text.1: In addition to the procedure referred to in the preceding paragraph, you may unsubscribe from the e-mails we send you for promotional, marketing and/or advertising purposes by clicking on the link that accompanies each of these e-mails, which is located at the bottom of the e-mails.

derechos.title: ARCO Rights
derechos.text: You or your duly accredited legal representative may exercise, when appropriate, the rights of access, rectification, cancellation or opposition hereinafter “ARCO RIGHTS” that the “LAW” provides, through the mechanism described below; it is important to mention that the exercise of any of the “ARCO RIGHTS” does not prevent the exercise of another right.

mecanismos.title: Mechanisms for the exercise of ARCO Rights and the revocation of consent for the processing of your personal data.

text.0: The exercise of the “ARCO RIGHTS” as well as the revocation of your consent for the processing of your personal data will be made through the presentation of the respective request, which in writing and in Spanish language must be submitted by the owner of the personal data or his legal representative, to the attention of the PERSONAL DATA PROTECTION OFFICE OF “Smile Bus” to the address located at Corredor Industrial Exterior Number 3, Interior Number Edif. Corp. 21 Colonia Frac Industrial Sahagún, Municipio Tepeapulco, Código Postal 43998, Hidalgo, Mexico (shipping costs will be paid by the applicant), or to the e-mail address datos.personales@smilebus.com.mx.
text.1: Your request must include your full name and surname, a simple, legible and valid copy of your official identification or in case of using electronic means, you must attach a digitalized version of the same (scan), e-mail or address you designate for notifications and a contact telephone number. If your application is submitted by your legal representative, you must additionally attach to your application, the official documents proving such representation.
text.2: In the event that the information provided in your request is erroneous or insufficient to fulfill it, or if the corresponding accreditation documents are not provided, you will be requested within five business days following the receipt of your request, to provide the necessary elements or documents to process it. You will have a period of ten working days to respond to such request, counted from the day after it has been issued by the PERSONAL DATA PROTECTION OFFICE OF “Smile Bus”. If you do not respond to such request within the given period, your request will be deemed not to have been submitted.
text.3: Once the aforementioned requirements have been met, within a maximum period of twenty working days from the date of receipt of your request for “ARCO RIGHTS”, as well as the revocation of the processing of personal data, the PERSONAL DATA PROTECTION OFFICE OF “Smile Bus” will respond to your request by e-mail to the e-mail address you have indicated in the request itself, or by sending a notification to the address you have indicated for such purposes (the twenty days will be deemed fulfilled at the time of delivery of the request), by means of an e-mail to the e-mail address indicated in the request itself, or by sending a notification to the address indicated for such purposes (the twenty days will be deemed to have elapsed upon delivery of the document to the postal service). If the request is granted, it will be effective within fifteen working days following the date on which the response on the validity of the request is communicated.

text.0: Your personal data will not be transferred nationally or internationally to third parties without your consent, except as provided in Article 37 of “LAW”:
text.1: When the transfer is made between controlling companies, subsidiaries or affiliates under the common control of “Smile Bus”, or to a parent company or to any company of the same group of “Smile Bus” that operates under the same internal processes and policies.
text.2: When the transfer is necessary for prevention or medical diagnosis, the provision of health care, medical treatment or the management of health services.
text.3: When the transfer is necessary by virtue of a contract entered into or to be entered into that is in your interest, by “Smile Bus” and a third party, with the purpose of granting you benefits.
text.4: When the transfer is necessary for the maintenance or fulfillment of a legal relationship between “Smile Bus” and you, such as suppliers, banking and credit institutions, chambers of commerce, among others.
text.5: When the transfer is necessary or legally required for the safeguarding of a public interest, or for the procurement or administration of justice.

informacion.title: Information on the Internet
informacion.text: We inform you that we have electronic technologies (cookies and web beacons) on our website: www.smilebus.com.mx, so that when you access our website, we receive information about your browser type and operating system, the web pages you have recently visited, the links you have recently followed, the IP address of your computer and the site you closed before entering our website. You can disable or adjust the use of these technologies by following the procedures of the Internet browser you use to access our website.

exclusion.title: Exclusion of liability of our website or application
exclusion.text: We inform you that we have electronic technologies (cookies and web beacons) on our website: www.smilebus.com.mx, so that when you access our website, we receive information about your browser type and operating system, the web pages you have recently visited, the links you have recently followed, the IP address of your computer and the site you closed before entering our website. You can disable or adjust the use of these technologies by following the procedures of the Internet browser you use to access our website.

text.0: “Smile Bus” will retain your information for as long as it is needed for the purpose for which it was collected, unless you request us to delete it, and, in such case, provided that “Smile Bus” no longer has a need to retain your information for other reasons. “Smile Bus” may retain your personal data for longer periods than those required by applicable laws, if it is in our legitimate business interest and the laws do not prohibit it.
text.1: Please note that where we have collected your personal information based on your consent and you withdraw such consent, or exercise your ARCO rights (to delete your personal information), we may keep your information blocked and available as long as required to comply with applicable laws and for “Smile Bus” to fulfill its responsibilities arising from the processing of your data.

modificaciones.title: Changes to this privacy notice
modificaciones.text: “Smile Bus” reserves the right to modify or update this “NOTICE” at any time. The modifications that are made will be made available to users through one or some of the following means: visible announcements in our ticket offices or establishments, via our website www.smilebus.com.mx, mobile applications, via email to the most recent address we have for you, by means of posters, sound recordings, video or personally through our managers, at the time of going to any of our facilities.
